original_text: Some of Jesus' disciples were talking about the temple. They spoke about the many beautiful stones in the walls. They also spoke about the many gifts to God that people had put there.
korean_text: 어떤 사람들이 성전을 가리켜 그 아름다운 돌과 헌물로 꾸민 것을 말하매 예수께서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: Some of Jesus' disciples were talking about the temple.
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님의 제자 몇 사람이 성전에 대해 이야기하고 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: They spoke about the many beautiful stones in the walls.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 성벽에 있는 아름다운 돌들에 대해 이야기했습니다.

sentences.original_text: They also spoke about the many gifts to God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 또한 하나님께 바쳐진 많은 예물에 대해서도 이야기했습니다.
